item.description:
Join us for a tapas dinner! Tapas refers to small plates, so this will be a family style, sharing experience. Most tapas cost between $5 and $10, with a few that are a bit more expensive. Depending on how many people attend, and how much we order, the bill should be between $30 & $35 per person.

 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

 

Saturday, August 11th, 6:30pm

Loco's Tapas and Wine Bar

530 Foundry Street

Route 106

South Easton, MA

508-230-loco (5626)

http://www.locotapas.com

 

Meeting Place: Please meet outside the front door. We may have to wait a few minutes to be seated.

Please Note:

1. They may split us into two tables.

2. They may not seat complete parties if they are extremely busy. If you are running very late or not attending please call the restaurant so they can let us know.

Organizer: Debbi

Event Fee: [Current] Annual Members - FREE, Members - $2 each; $6 to become a 2012 Annual Member

Min/Max: Minimum of 4 diners.  Due to the size of the restaurant, the max is set at 14 people.

Guests: None, this is a Group Members Only event.  (They can join the group if they would like to attend.)

RSVP Deadline: 8pm on Thursday, August 9th. Any changes made after this time may not be seen by an Event Organizer prior to the event and will be considered a No-Show.

No-Show Policy on Membership Information Page: (Please click on the following link to be taken directly to the page.)

http://www.meetup.com/ssdomg/pages/Membership_Information/

Cash Only Policy: Please bring cash! Paying for all of our meals in cash has been SSDOMG'S policy for years. It allows us to avoid the confusion of having the waitstaff run multiple credit card slips and generally helps to keep things simpler for everyone.

Inclement Weather: Based on the weather forecast we should be OK.  There may be a passing shower but we will meet rain or shine.  Please see our Weather policy on the About page (scroll to the bottom and click on "Weather").

 

Please see the Pages tab for more information about the SSDOMG's policies and procedures which help ensure a smoother, relaxed, fun dining experience for everyone.

 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

 

Directions: Route 24 South to exit  17B towards Easton.

Left on Washington Street, Right on Central Street.

Go right on Depot Street (RT 123), then a slight right on Foundry Street.

520 Foundry is on the left.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet outside the front door or at our table after we are seated.

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner at Loco's Tapas & Wine Bar
